nodes.text: Ordnandell was a planet in the galaxy.

During the Galactic Civil War, there was a shipping accident in hyperspace near Ordnandell, which delayed some spacers in their work. A Corellian freighter, referred to as the something or other Falcon dropped its cargo to escape an Imperial boarding party.
This planet first and only appearance is the first edition rulebook of West End Games's Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, designed by Greg Costikyan and published in October 1987.

While Ordnandell originated from a canon source, Jason Fry, co-author of The Essential Atlas, revealed during discussions about The Essential Atlas Online Companion that the planet was dropped at Lucasfilm request to avoid confusion with Ord Mantell.
